Author: Perunex
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The question is, who gets the money if LWF will actually miraculously bought? It will not just stay in the firm for future projects and future costs of the company as that wouldn't make sense - it wouldn't be bought than.  Will just Angelo take the money and run? Most possibly. Most definitely... We all however know that investors should get that money as a "liquidation mass".  Afterwards, new management, new owner will not actually have any obligation towards the coinholders (legally or morally), as he bought the company and paid for it. And that means that he could form a private blockchain, revoke all the current tokens and nobody could do nothing.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: Perunex
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: But this is exactly the problem with crypto and basically all the ICO's. Selling some coupons i.e. LWF coin for actual money. Don't you understand that this is why the regulator will never condone it in this form. There is no security for the investors. No guarantee.  It just doesn't make sense that the owner of the intellectual property are solely the developers, while we financed the project.

Author: daxp
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Investors themselves take such risks. They were not forced to invest in this project. While investors will not have more requirements for the project-such cases will occur constantly

Author: Perunex
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Sure, you are right. Can't argue with that. Terms and conditions state that and nobody can complain.  However, this is due to the "evolution" of blockchain crowdfunding. I am just saying that it will not go on like this. Regulator won't let it and investors will see the shit behind it. The crypto hype allowed this and a lot of people had to burn themselves to proceed with the evolution. ICO in this form will however die in the next 2-3 years. I do not think that investors will receive at least part of this money. This project is the intellectual property of its developers and they can sell it to anyone. And that will continue with the project from the new owner - not their problem

Author: daxp
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The regulator may not prohibit the ico. In addition, there are countries in which the ico is not limited. The controller may affect the exchange, but can not prohibit the ico to raise money. It's blockchain. Transactions cannot be blocked

Author: scolary23
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: You're the right guy, no one can ban this at an early stage of financing. We choose what we finance. This is a question of trust, to the developers. Of course, it would be fair if the proceeds for the sale of the project were divided among holders. But this will not happen.

Author: Perunex
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Say that to the Americans. Say that to Chinese. You can ban it easily...  And I am solely talking about raising funds. If you are raising funds and the investor obviously invested to earn money than you are practically always issuing security (token). Check the Howey test...

Author: daxp
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: They may influence the founder of the company, but they cannot stop the fundraising. These are two different things. The founder of the company should not be a citizen of these countries and he will not have such problems

Author: scolary23
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Exactly. We are not talking about the legality of the project, it is clear, that the regulators have an influence here. But, No one can forbid making transactions on a block chain if the investor is interested and sees a perspectiv. People need to be careful, as regulators are not a panacea for all the bad things.

New features/bots will continue to be added and developed for our new home.  You'll find most of the same channels there and there's a cool bot made by @deadpool which provides delegate information.  The aim is to migrate users from Slack to Discord as quickly as possible, new tools will only be added to Discord.  Join us!  https://discord.gg/h4jfuZD  The LWF Team

Author: Camerieresimone
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: quoting from the website:  This level of decentralization will bring a number of advantages that will surely give value to the LWF Coin itself: Safe The system is not localized, it is located on the blockchain, which is geolocated across all network nodes that allow the operation. This makes it immutable by hackers, viruses or sabotage by competitors. Privacy & Notarialization: Data will be protected by an encryption system that will only allow the owner of the company (or who has got the key to read encryption) to read the data contained in the blockchain. In addition to this, with the Opentime Stamps system, you can certify the time, date, and certainty of the data giving it legal value. Democratic: 201 delegates and 51 votes available, make our DPoS system truly democratic. Fast: Just few seconds to send and confirm a transaction within a forged block. Our Blockchain will be used not for logistics-data only, but as a crypto currency with real world uses. Technical Data Resume: 201 Delegates 51 Votes 15 Seconds per block 5 LWF rewards for each block for the first year 10 pre-forging days in prize for who will use the testnet 100M LWF Premined, 78% in TEC Testnet Avaliable in Nov 13 2018

Author: ghostfaceuk
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: OK, lets say we go for ANY EXCHANGE as you say.  we go for one of the smaller ones and the price tanks due to low trade volume.  you and others moan the exchange is not good enough.  Or we pay for one of the big ones and for what ever reason once again the trade volume is low, this may be due to the fact the business side is not yet active or something else.  you guys then complain we have wasted your investment by paying to get on there.  Unless we go for one of the REALLY small ones there will be delays which will mean people will complain.  We are in a no win situation with regards to exchanges.  we have paid exchanges to be listed and are waiting for them to finalise everything and announce it.  we will only know when we are listed when they do this but whilst we ALL wait (remember I am an investor in this project as well) there are people constantly moaning from the VERY DAY the TEC ended that we are not on a exchange. It is now literally just over 2 months since the end of the TEC, I dont think that is too long a wait, some projects are taking a lot longer to be added to exchanges. Even ERC20 tokens are having to wait and they are some of the easiest for exchanges to integrate.  Deals with exchanges have been reached, as has been stated many times we are waiting for them to list. this is outside of our control.  we are constantly in communication with them trying to speed things up but there is not much more we can do.  they have everything from us they need to make it happen, now it is all down to them

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: ghostfaceuk
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Exchange listing will happen but it is one thing we have no control over.  Have you tried to get a token listed on a exchange recently?   The delay in responses from the exchanges as well as technical time it takes them to review code to ensure it can be integrated as well as the testing they need to do to make sure all is good at their end with regards to deposits, withdrawals and actual trades takes time.  It has been two months (or just over actually) since the TEC ended and the tokens were distributed.  There are lots of other projects in our position with regards to being listed on exchanges, even ETh based ERC20 tokens are struggling to be listed and they are some of the easiest to integrate.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Hi Guys,  So, just a sneak peek of something that will be contained in the newsletter. We have previously talked and talked about partnerships but stopped mentioning them by name (at their request) before having something signed. Do you remember? Good. Today the big player that we have been talking to since December have sent us the draft of the agreement to use them as partner for our P2P Freight forwarding service. So, as we always say, we have been working hard behind the scenes to make things happen, even if we are a young project and we are taking the right steps to make everything the best we can. More news in the next newsletter.

Body: Bounty has not been distributed yet some people here have been cynical to Bounty hunter. Words that are always spoken by people who feel as if they are more important than the Bounty hunter.  The right of everyone it's same be it an investor or a Bounty hunter to dump or hold their coin, no one can force them. When the price crashes and if you really believe in the future of this project, would not that be an opportunity for you to get more coins at a cheaper price? No need to be cynical and let it the market work with its own mechanism.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Dear Forwarders,  As you may recall in our recent newsletter we mentioned running a poll/vote to gather your thoughts about potentially moving away from Slack. This is due to the 10k message limitation and the prohibitive cost of removing this restriction.  Below you will find the link to the poll which will remain open for two weeks to give people plenty of time to give their views. For the avoidance of doubt the form will close to submissions by `10th April @ 9pm (GMT)`  https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdrP3ZAV3NCFGKMDcyVosPCpnF224bogvHbwVxtbyzF5EQsvw/formResponse  We value your input on this matter, as selecting the right platform is important for us all.  Thank you  The LWF Team

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: @channel  *Dear LWF TEC Supporters,*   We are very pleased to confirm that the LWF TEC Coin calculations have been completed.  `You are now able to redeem your LWF Tokens.`   *The process to redeem your tokens is as follows: -*   Login to your LWF account - https://www.lwf.io/en/login  *You will see a Red Redeem button on the top right corner, click on this button.*  You will now see a wallet address field, this is where you enter your `LWF Mainnet wallet address`. It is important that you enter the wallet information accurately, if you enter the wrong information LWF will not be able to recover your funds. When you have checked it is the correct address then click Ok.  If you haven't created a wallet for mainnet yet, please click on the following link and create a New Account. https://wallet.lwf.io/   *If you have any questions please let one of the community support team know.*   Thank you  *LWF Team*

Body: No,  this redemption works for investors who contributed during the ICO to use it in their profile account to redeem their tokens, unless you contributed during TEC then this would work for you. As for bounties, I believe this would be distributed by the bounty manager or team soon.

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: For the bounty: Dear LWF community,   we will begin our bounty distribution in a few days. Please remember to communicate your LWF address (if you applied to our bounty program and wrote your ETH address on the first version of the form) writing a post with your bitcointalk profile on the official LWF bounty thread on Bitcointalk https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2285038.new#new . You will have 2 weeks to communicate us your LWF address, until 14 March 2018. After that it will not be possible to redeem your bounties.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: You could not find the price of LWF during ICO because all 78,000,000 coins will be proportionally distributed among all contributors after TEC sale ends. For example: if a total amount of 1000 bitcoin is reached, for each bitcoin contributed 78000 coin will be credited, (78.000.000/1000) so If you've contributed with 0.5 bitcoin you'll have 39.000 coin. Please refer to the LWF White paper for detailed calculation and examples: https://www.lwf.io/docs/lwf_whitepaper_en.pdf

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: *Dear LWF TEC Supporters,*   _The LWF TEC phase closed at 23:59hrs GMT - 23rd February 2018._  Any tokens received after this time will not be counted.   The coin distribution script has been tested for the last few days, and due to the success of the testing, *`we aim to complete coin distribution by 24th/25th February 2018`*.    As you can imagine we are double and triple checking the calculations before distribution begins.    *We will confirm when the Redeem button is enabled on your TEC Account page.  This is where you will add the wallet address you want your TEC tokens distributed to.*  Following completion of the coin distribution the LWF voting accounts will unvote all delegates and the voting will then be open to the Public voting.  So delegates get your pools ready! :slightly_smiling_face:  *We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your support, and are very excited to have you on board.*  There will be a number of updates and communications over the next few days and weeks.   *The LWF Team*

Author: Crypto is the future
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: I will give you a direct answer of the CEO:  "Nice question.  We.already did all things related exchanges. Paid and take agreement for, at least, 4 exchanges and two of them very huge.  We have some dates but since them are not sure yet we want avoid to compromise our reputation saying dates that can't be maintained or changed. As soon exchanges will grant for sure at 100% one Day we will public it, but only after a confirmation from them. I am personally tired and bored from fake news and hyping stuffs said only to create hype, so, we will say names and date only when we will sure of the real information provided by exchanges.  But I can guarantee that we paid more than 15% of raised funds in exchanges (and we paid two months ago.) and one team member is full dedicated to exchanges to ping them everyday."

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: *Hello to all members of our LWF community,*  We would like to take this opportunity to provide some quick updates on technical fixes and Business Strategy.  *Blockchain Technical Updates*  -*A major bug that was crashing nodes and causing them to resync from block 1 has been fixed [PLEASE UPDATE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE YOUR NODE with the command “git pull” inside of the lwf-node directory and then “./lwf_manager.bash reload” command. Thank you]* -The script for redemption of tokens bought during the ICO/Pre-Sale has been written and is in the last phase of testing -A Minor fix to reduce the log sizes on both Mainnet and Testnet nodes will be rolled out soon -The LWF Nano wallet is available foe the community to download and install *LWF PoC 0.0.30 has been released!* Release notes: - BUG reolution: fixed geocomplete component on service configuration page - Multiple destinations in service configuration - P2Pforwarding Service configuration now allows specification of weekdays availability - Fixed responsive behaviour for the whole site - Backend for internal notification subsystem - Webmaster notifications upgraded - Password reset mechanism - Fixed minor graphical/type/behaviour issues (edited)  *Business Updates*  -Whilst we are looking at and talking to some of the big players in the world of Logistics, we are also reviewing their streams and have been looking at potential link ups with small/medium partners to provide excellence and quality along with the best possible range of options for our users -We will closely monitor the need for large, medium and small providers to ensure we are offering the right services in the right places to ensure we provide the highest quality service -We are pleased to announce the first version of The LWF Mobile App will be released around the end of March in both the Apple and Android stores.  This will include Express Delivery and Package collecting main functionality and management. - Credit Concept: To allow people to purchase with PayPal (gateways will be definied soon) and other payment gateways, we've decided to introduce the concept of the "Bundle Credit": Bundle credit will be just a definition, you can always compare 1$ to 1 Bundle Credit, when you'll create an offer or you're going to purchase one services the price will be always in Bundle Credit. When you make a deposit of any type (caution or deposit to purchase a service), cryptocurrencies used or fiat used will be always converted in Bundle Credit (remember 1$ = Bundle Credit). This will allow us to manage fiat payment avoiding to exclude 99% of our potential customer. In the first version of the APP the withdrawal in FIAT won't be allowed (can be done only in BTC\LWF even if the deposit can be made with third parties gateways). -Marketing:  We are currently evaluating various Marketing Agencies to ascertain who are best suited to promoting in the Real World Market (not only in the cryptoverse).  This may be a lengthy process due to our doing due diligence and careful selection of this important part of helping the business succeed. Team Update: Fabio Legrenzi has left the project for personal reasons.  We wish all the best for future projects and plans.  Good luck in all your future endeavours. - Blockchain Development: We are starting the process of moving over to TypeScript core for the project, this will not require a hardfork.  The work will be undertaken by Andrea (Vekexasia) concurrently with the delevopment of the Logistics fuctions.  We are extremely confident that the change of core coding will improve the quality and performence of the blockchain. There will be minor implmentations made during this process *Brand Diversification:* With a corporate diversification strategy we’re glad to launch our two brands: LWF Blockchain for the technological and financial services, LWF Logistics Logo for the interlogistics, web services and P2P platforms and Mobile Apps.  *The LWF Team*

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Is LWF a courier? LWF is not a courier. LWF acts as an intermediary. LWF Direct Logistics will have a branch that arranges courier services if forwarding is not yet available in some regions. LWF will not only coordinate the needs between forwarders and receivers but will also incorporate tools like escrow, bureaucratic modules, and ancillary insurance to both receivers and forwarders.

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: What is the concept behind LWF? LWF’s concept is similar to that of the Uber business model. We create more jobs for people by removing the barriers created by third parties. In the logistics environment (and to be more accurate, in the Freight Forwarding World), LWF will make it possible for people to offer three services in one: Express Delivery, Package Collecting, and our primary service, Freight Forwarding. LWF will secure one main shipping partner which allows our forwarders to keep prices low. We pass these savings on to our customers when either shipping or receiving packages all over the world. Is LWF a courier? LWF is not a courier. LWF acts as an intermediary. LWF Direct Logistics will have a branch that arranges courier services if forwarding is not yet available in some regions. LWF will not only coordinate the needs between forwarders and receivers but will also incorporate tools like escrow, bureaucratic modules, and ancillary insurance to both receivers and forwarders. Our business is a Person to Person Model, as Uber does. We are not focusing to make the supply chain better, we dont work to organize cargo or float or to make the process of the logistics companies easier to be done, so we are happy that exist a lot of projects like shipchain, We work to provide a solution to remove walls created by third parties that maximize costs and make slower the procedure to make a freight forwarding spedition, also we will offer the express delivery and package collecting product that our forwarders can offer through us.

Author: wolfgb888
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: DpoS is Delegate proof of stake, a type of blockchain technology, like ARK for example. This system represents an evolution from the PoS (Proof of Stake) developed in order to reduce costs and inefficiencies associated with energy consumption, typical of the PoW (Proof of Work) systems used by Bitcoin. The DPoS system, first used with Bitshares by developer Dan Larimer, differs from the original PoS systems. DPoS, a delegated proof of stake system, requires a smaller decentralised network which consumes considerably less energy to secure its blockchain. Delegates, elected by the whole network with a democratic voting system, validate every single transaction on the LWF network. Within this DPoS system each delegate receives five LWF coins for forging a new block. If within that block a delegate processes a number of transactions,  he or she also receives a transaction fee. You can also understand here what be the DPOS;  https://www.mycryptopedia.com/delegated-proof-stake-dpos-explained/

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Escrow in simple terms is basically when funds is held by a trusted third party. It is only released once certain conditions are met by both the buyer and the seller. In this case, the buyer/receivers pays for the delivery and this money is held by the escrow until the shipment is received and it's in good condition before the funds is released to the forwarder.

Images and other photographic & video evidences would also be evaluated when complaints are lodged. Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: To become a forwarder, you would also have to pay security fees, the amount to pay is at your discretion in the first level up to a threshold calculated by the system based on the number of properly managed shipments and the level of feedback but be rest assured it would not exceed 750 USD. The likelihood of matching to ship items for clients would be greater if your security deposit is high.  You can actually start with a few dollars and gradually increase your security fees with time. Also note that you would get a re-imbursement of your security deposit when your performance in the system is good and you have satisfied all LWF standards & rules, with of course positive feedbacks, no disputes, and efficiency in your service.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: It is mandatory for a forwarder to pay security fees which help sustain the good behavior and practice by the forwarder. The security deposit when paid to the system, will remain there when the vendor receives good ratings and feedbacks are positive with no disputes in progress then it will be returned. The greater the security deposit, the higher the likelihood of matching and the number of manageable shipments. Also the security deposit is at the user's discretion in the first level up to a threshold calculated by the system based on the number of properly managed shipments and the level of feedback. Sign up on the P2P alpha platform  https://poc.lwf.io/ to register as  Local forwarder.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The price of LWF isn't fixed yet till the ICO is over. All 78,000,000 coins will be proportionally distributed among all contributors after TEC sale ends. For example: if a total amount of 1000 bitcoin is reached, for each bitcoin contributed 78000 coin will be credited, (78.000.000/1000) so If you've contributed with 0.5 bitcoin you'll have 39.000 coin. Please refer to the LWF White paper for detailed calculation and examples: https://www.lwf.io/docs/lwf_whitepaper_en.pdf

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

This summation will determine the amount of LWF to be credited.

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Main Branch is a P2P (Person to Person) Platform that will allow people to becomes forwarders or receiver in freight forwarding business to help the emerging economy countries to receive goods. Other services provided always p2p are Express Delivery and Package Collecting. Second branch will be the DPoS Blockchain, that is a DPoS Envinronment where the blockchain will have a database schema designed with the unique purpose to serve, collect and organize logistical informations from companies and from our P2P Portal as well. So this Branch will allow companies to join our blockchain as database sobstitution or integration: reducing IT Costs, HA costs and Software integrations between partners since our data will have a common standard.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The issue of privacy is not to be toyed with because as much as the platform is also in partnership with other project startups like Bitboost which takes data privacy seriously via encryption, so privacy in LWF platform is guaranteed and secured. This means data will be protected by an encryption system that will only allow the owner of the company (or who has got the key to read encryption) to read the data contained in the blockchain. In addition to this, with the Opentime Stamps system, you can certify the time, date, and certainty of the data giving it legal value.

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Dear fantastic LWF community,  We are working so hard to accomplish this dream.  As you know, we have released many updates during these past few weeks, but I want to tell you about our most recent development.  As you know, we have been trying to arrange a potential partnership with *DHL* and have been waiting to hear back from them. Today one of the top executives from DHL Italy contacted me personally and we have a meeting scheduled for January 24. Nothing closed yet, but we're close to understand how far we can go with DHL.  We are thrilled to see our donations growing every day, and also really excited that we have secured a space for our Headquarters that will be ready in a few weeks. Now we are making even greater strides with DHL, and other big players are finally taking notice of LWF.  Stay in touch, and thanks again to all team members, Coinbar, crypto.si, and everyone participating with us on this journey to success.  Regards, Angelo and LWF TEAM

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Indeed this is great news for the project and its supporters to learn that plans to partner with courier giant DHL is almost concluded which would be a great milestone achieved by the LWF project to increase mass adoption and global outreach.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: According to the white paper which clearly states that the  greater the security deposit, the higher the likelihood of matching and the number of manageable shipments. Also the security deposit is at the user's discretion in the first level up to a threshold calculated by the system based on the number of properly managed shipments and the level of feedback. What this means is that, if a vendor has a bad rating and negative feedbacks, he would certainly be out of business obviously. So you can select a vendor from with good feedback and positive ratings. Feel free to sign up on the P2P alpha platform here site https://poc.lwf.io/

Author: Scholles
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Am excited that the TEC is only 2 weeks away,  I have also observed that there has not been any donations in railblocks.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: No you got it all mixed up,  security deposit is being paid by the vendor and not you. If he performs well and has very good feedbacks/ratings and no disputes in progress then he will have it refunded. On the other hand, you will get a refund of the contents of the shipment when photographic evidence or other evidences are provided and investigation carried out. This is handled  by ambassadors dedicated staff and covered by insurance.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Why not if it has such plans? The platform will act as an intermediary to ensure all the necessary infrastructure for a number of P2P services. In my opinion, it’s a good option of promotion of one’s activities all over the world.

Body: I’m wondering why is the amount of the security deposit is set by the supplier himself? Well, he will deposit a couple of dollars when delivering a product which costs $1000, there will be a problem with the parcel and a 2$ compensation won’t make the buyer feel better.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: Ackedy
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Logistics company based on the blockchain — that’s really cool! However, it is so, until there is a dispute and one of the parties doesn’t like a mediator’s decision. In this case, there won’t be a possibility to appeal to any judicial authority. Though, if you work with traditional postal services, then such a possibility exists. That’s a drawback for LWF.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Lucky for you, every transaction in LWF will be accompanied by a notarial form, in which will be recorded all the key data on the committed delivery. With such notarial you can apply to appropriate authority and seek for justice.

Author: Ackedy
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Huh… By the way, I thought of one more disadvantage — LWF is based on the blockchain, which is little known to the population. Therefore, the notarial form from such a platform will not be accepted by all judicial authorities...

Author: MadduckUK
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Soon after the launch, the LWF network will be an integrated solution all around the world. It will set logistic standards, so you can be sure, that such notarial form will be accepted by judicial authorities all over the world!

Author: sinfazat22ron
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: What is the situation with the protection of users’ data in these notarial forms?

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Hello! In a dPOS system, the more cryptocoin you have, you have more power vote. Your power vote is proportional to the total cryptocoin. So if you have 1000 cryptocoin and another person has 10000, this last one has more power vote.

Author: MadduckUK

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: What is the concept behind LWF? LWF’s concept is similar to that of the Uber business model. We create more jobs for people by removing the barriers created by third parties. In the logistics environment (and to be more accurate, in the Freight Forwarding World), LWF will make it possible for people to offer three services in one: Express Delivery, Package Collecting, and our primary service, Freight Forwarding. LWF will secure one main shipping partner which allows our forwarders to keep prices low. We pass these savings on to our customers when either shipping or receiving packages all over the world.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Proof of Work (POW) is used to determine if the miner does indeed possess a copy of the blockchain and has validated each and every transaction to be in sync with the rest of the nodes around the world. What this means is POW ascertains if the blocks that has been mined by the miner are the same blocks that are present with the majority of nodes across the network. While Delegated Proof of Stake (DPOS)  is a method for securing a cryptocurrency network, processing transactions and achieving a distributed consensus regarding the ownership of funds without the need for a central authority. It is a variant of the Proof of Stake system (POS) , which itself was developed in order to reduce the cost and inefficient electricity usage associated with Proof of Work systems such as the one used by Bitcoin. The difference between a POS system and a DPOS system is that POS involves the participation of the entire network to validate a transaction whereas DPOS involves only a limit number of delegates.These delegates perform the function of validating transactions, maintaining the blockchain and take the transaction fees as profit.

Author: wolfgb888
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The distributed database is less attacked by a centralized system. The system is not localized, it is located on the blockchain, which is geolocated across all network nodes that allow the operation. This makes it immutable by hackers, viruses or sabotage by competitors.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: One of the aims of the LWF project is to offer services in those regions where today is full of gaps. LWF implements a decentralized freight forwarding network which guarantees a comprehensive solution within our internal network. The private freight forwarder will receive buyers’ packages at their homes or other predetermined locations and forward them. It will set the coverage limits of its services and a selection of possible shipping methods with the relative delivery costs and times in addition to commission amounts by entering this information into our system. you can join the new network of forwarders by writing an email to support.

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Main Branch is a P2P (Person to Person) Platform that will allow people to becomes forwarders or receiver in freight forwarding business to help the emerging economy countries to receive goods. Other services provided are P2P Express Delivery and Package Collecting. Second branch will be the DPoS Blockchain, that is a DPoS Envinronment where the blockchain will have a database schema designed with the unique purpose to serve, collect and organize logistical informations from companies and from our P2P Portal as well. So this Branch will allow companies to join our blockchain as database sobstitution or integration: reducing IT Costs, HA costs and Software integrations between partners since our data will have a common standard.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: It will be based on the object's declared value (which requires documented proof), the shipment's protection and access to customer care that will carry out the above checks, confirm and provide refund if the package is stolen, lost or irreparably damaged  in any stage following the forwarder's reception. Also the tracking must note that the package is lost or signed with reserved if the package is damaged.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: DPOs stands for Delegated Proof of Stake which is a method for securing a cryptocurrency network, processing transactions and achieving a distributed consensus regarding the ownership of funds without the need for a central authority. It is a variant of the Proof of Stake system, which itself was developed in order to reduce the cost and inefficient electricity usage associated with Proof of Work systems such as the one used by Bitcoin. Transactions are maintain and managed by Delegates on the DPOs network. These delegates perform the function of validating transactions, maintaining the blockchain and take the transaction fees as profit. Within this transaction validation system, each delegate receives a reward in LWF coin, in the form of transaction fee, in order to cover the operating costs needed to keep in efficiency conditions forging nodes (to which transaction verification is delegated) as well as maintaining the LWF network in safe conditions.

These warranties will only cover LWF direct services and those operated by the brokerage service providers. For any issues caused by couriers during reshipping or caused by the shipper, it will be necessary to contact the customer care or have signed for a total LWF insurance for the product.

Author: gavrosh
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The DPoS system, implemented for the first time on Bitshares by developer Daniel Larimer, differs from the PoS system. DPOS is a delegated proof of stake system, this is different to POW and POS as it requires a smaller, decentralised network, using considerably less energy to secure it’s blockchain.

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Dear LWF Community,    The whole LWF Team would like to wish you all a very Merry Christmas, and relaxing break.    We would also like to take this opportunity to thank you all, you are very important to the success of our project    A special message for our partners: #RDD (Reddcoin), PIVX, Zcoin and OXY.  We wish all success for you and your project in 2018!    Don’t forget that in a couple of days we plan to start the new year, with a Community giveaway.  The prizes will be official LWF USB drives, each containing a number of coins from our partners.    Rules to participate will be shared in the official LWF social media channels and in our Newsletter.  We are working hard to produce the first LWF Newsletter and i’m pleased to say it will be released very soon!    So.. stay in touch and enjoy your xmas break!    🎄  🎄 🎄 The LWF Team 🎄 🎄 🎄

Author: wolfgb888
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The conservation and the protection of private data, it is very clear and understandable explanation on Dpos. The system is not localized, it is located on the blockchain, which is geolocated across all network nodes that allow the operation. This makes it immutable by hackers, viruses or sabotage by competitors.

Author: g8stTDas
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Greetings! Can you explain what advantages does the platform get from using DPoS?

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: DPOS is a type of Blockchain where there are 201 delegates that controll the network and forg the block. The Blockchain is a safe and transparent system to controll the transaction of the LWF coin. In the DPOS, you don´t spend a lot of energy like in POW, and the LWF holders can decide the delegates by voting to them. It is a democratic system.

Author: bars_kz
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: wolfgb888
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: woodcoin
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Main Branch is a P2P (Person to Person) Platform that will allow people to becomes forwarders or receiver in freight forwarding business to help the emerging economy countries to receive goods. Other services provided always p2p are Express Delivery and Package Collecting. Second branch will be the DPoS Blockchain, that is a DPoS Envinronment where the blockchain will have a database schema designed with the unique purpose to serve, collect and organize logistical informations from companies and from our P2P Portal as well. So this Branch will allow companies to join our blockchain as database sobstitution or integration: reducing IT Costs, HA costs and Software integrations between partners since our data will have a common standard.The delegates will help on this second branch of the Blockchain.

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: we are going to accept usd, eur. And now we did an agreement with the reddcoin!We now accept RDD for our ICO and will be absolutelly our unique TIP coin for our platform (and also an accepted payment method as well!)

Author: polonium84
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The number of tokens held by a person would be affected  such that the prize you receive when you voted for a delegate would be dependent on the weight of tokens held by you. The higher the number of tokens held, the bigger you will be rewarded you every time a block will be found.

Author: Ackedy
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: In my opinion, modern postal services offer similar services. But they have no individual couriers for every parcel, they send big lot of goods which are distributed to towns then. All in all, I don’t think that existence of such a project makes any sense, it doesn’t offer anything interesting.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: That’s the point! Postal services send the parcels as big lots of them which are transferred to sort facilities where the undergo distribution procedures and etc. All these increase the timeframe of delivery of each parcel. LWF operation model excludes any intermediaries from this chain and this fact reduces the costs and delivery time.

Author: Ackedy
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: On the other hand, postal services are safer. No one knows these forwarders, they can fade away with my parcel.

It will set coverage limit of its services and a selection of possible shipping methods,  relative delivery costs and times in addition to its own commission by entering this information into the system.

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: You can read in the whitepaper: Vendor subdivision will be carried out in levels, determined by the number of packages forwarded or delivered, the feedback received and the Dollar volume reached. The deposit for vendors will be at the user’s discretion in the first level, up to a threshold calculated by the system based on the number of properly managed shipments, the level of feedback obtained and an amount not exceeding $ 750. It will therefore be possible to start with just a few dollars and gradually increase the amount of the security deposit, considering that packages can be assigned for a maximum total value of up to 150% of the security deposit’s value; thus the greater the security deposit, the higher the likelihood of matching and the number of manageable shipments.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Delegated Proof of Stake is a method for securing a cryptocurrency network, processing transactions and achieving a distributed consensus regarding the ownership of funds without the need for a central authority. It is a variant of the Proof of Stake system, which itself was developed in order to reduce the cost and inefficient electricity usage associated with Proof of Work systems such as the one used by Bitcoin. The difference between a POS system and a DPOS system is that POS involves the participation of the entire network to validate a transaction whereas DPOS involves only a limit number of delegates.These delegates perform the function of validating transactions, maintaining the blockchain and take the transaction fees as profit.

Author: Vorteqs
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Thanks so much for this  thorough and detailed explanation about DPOS system and it's comparison with POS,  with this anyone would understand why it is alot better than the POS system and commonly being adopted in recent times by some projects.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: LWF decided to develop their own blockchain after a series of technical and logical evaluations such that any logistics or handling company will be able to utilize it's blockchain in a way that its data in a distributed database that will safeguard the company's data, making any logistic operation unassailable to any threats related to classical information systems (Virus, IT, Cloud Connectivity or Remote Servers). It will allow to aggregate all information related to the supply chain logistics within the transactions and the network, making them accessible quickly and safely by companies that are participating in the network.

Some of the functions will be released in the Alpha test next week:   *LWF P2P Portal in ALPHA on December 20th!!*  The Alpha version of the P2P Portal is currently in development.  The Portal will have the main functions available such as:  - User registrations and KYC verification - P2P Freight Forwarding, P2P Express Delivery and Packages collecting services available to be prepared. - Sales Offer by Forwarders can be created - Integration of Crypto's Payments - First minimal Blockchain Integration - Feedback - Beta-Forwarders will be imported from PRE-SALE subscriptions as exclusive testers

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The agent can't disappear because he has registered in the platform as a freight forwarder, filled a KYC form and also paid security fee and the essence of the security deposit is to discourage improper use of the system, and in order to manage disputes and feedback. The greater the security deposit, the higher the likelihood of matching and the number of manageable shipments allocated. Also a team of staff is also available to handle disputes that may arise and an insurance is placed to ensure buyers protection when there's is damaged in the expected goods or even lost in transit.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The Blockchain in DPos is supported by a group of "forgers" or delegates who have the task of mining/forging. The delegates receive votes by their supporters, the more coin you have in wallet, the more it weighs the vote. The delegate reward supporters with other coin. An example of DPoS its the ARK coin.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The DPoS is a democratic system that gives prize to everyone that participates and supports the community. As prize delegates that receive support from a token holder by voting them with the weight of tokens, will be rewarded you every time a block will be found. So, this means can earn more LWF Coin just giving your support to your preferred delegate.

Author: JooBra
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: First you register in the wallet then they vote here is about it from whitepaper: "These delegates, elected by the whole network with a democratic voting system, validate each every single transaction on the LWF network. Within this DPOS system each delegate recieves 5 LWF coins for forging a new block. If within that block the delegate processes a number of transactions, they receive transaction fees in addition.These rewards are used in order for the delegates to cover their operating costs required to maintain their main net servers. "

Author: bars_kz
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Welcome. I don't quite understand what are chain and network transactions. Can someone explain this to me, if it’s not difficult?

Author: dredson1983
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: All the transaction, that is when someone send some LWF coin to another, is registered in a chain, that is called Blockchain. So every coin has the transaction registered in the Blockchain. And in LwF, the delegates help to register this and then receive a reward.

Author: JooBra
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The blockchain is a shared public ledger on which the entire LWF coin network relies. All confirmed transactions are included in the blockchain. This way, LWF wallets can calculate their spendable balance and new transactions can be verified to be spending LWF coin that are actually owned by the spender. The integrity and the chronological order of the blockchain are enforced with cryptography.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: This dividend package has been removed and replaced with a new technology that innovates the concept of blockchain, the DPos system. The DPoS is a democratic system that gives prize to everyone that participates and supports the community. As prize delegates that receive support from a token holder by voting them with the weight of tokens, will be rewarded you every time a block will be found. So, this means can earn more LWF Coin just giving your support to your preferred delegate.

Author: Vorteqs
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: There is no buy-back program as this has been removed and another model replaced it known as Dpos.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The DPOS is an evolution from POS system developed in order to reduce costs and inefficiencies associated with electricity consumption which is typical of POS system. The responsibility to manage the network and transactions is handled by ambassadors group of delegates elected by the whole network with a democratic vote system. They(delegate) validate every single transaction on the LWF network. This DPOS would enable the creation of a secure, decentralized and performance-based logistics database through the block chain and network generated transactions. This will LWF develop a technology to make it a future standard for global logistics.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: MkrKing
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: There will not be anything complicated, really. Everything will work as follows: the application will display real-time requests for delivery in neighboring areas, and suppliers will be able to accept these requests by contacting the customer directly at the specified point on the card at the specified time and completing the delivery on their own, earning at the same commission

If the Ukrainian company’s trial of bitcoin proves successful, it is likely that other firms will follow their example. Russian broker Interchart LLC are reportedly also looking at bitcoin as a means of circumventing banking restrictions. Bitcoin’s real-world use cases are often regarded from a consumer perspective. Increasingly, however, the digital currency is proving its worth not with P2P but B2B. https://news.bitcoin.com/this-ukrainian-shipping-firm-is-using-bitcoin-to-evade-sanctions/?utm_source=OneSignal%20Push&utm_medium=notification&utm_campaign=Push%20Notifications

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: deort
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: In general, everything is as simple as possible: A private freight forwarder will receive the packages of the buyer in his office or in another suitable place, and deliver them to the address. The customer of the parcel will know all the basic information about his freight forwarder: first name, surname, patronymic, age, brand and color used to deliver the car, its license plate, etc.

Author: Ackedy
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: And how much will such a complex service cost?

Author: deort
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: There is no fixed cost, because the freight forwarder himself sets the delivery costs and the amount of commission fees for their services.

The DPoS is a democratic system that gives prize to everyone that participates and supports the community. As prize delegates that receive support from a token holder by voting them with the weight of tokens, will be rewarded you every time a block will be found. So, this means can earn more LWF Coin just giving your support to your preferred delegate.

So, this means that you are free to participate and register as a forwarder.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

The only news that I can say is that DHL, a big logistic company, is very interested in the LWF and today the LWF CEO was at a meeting in the DHL.

Author: spacegt
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: As for me, I think that it's right that LWF won’t cooperate with the postal services. Why does it to add a bunch of intermediaries, suffer with bureaucracy. Let LWF develop as an independent project, try innovations, etc. I think that cooperation with postal services will only slow down the development of the company.

Author: deort
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: But when you work with postal services, if the order is delivered damaged or not delivered at all, you can simply contact the appropriate government agency so that they will deal with it. How to deal with problems in LWF, if I receive a damaged parcel? If I come to court and say that I paid for the delivery of the crypto currency, and I have a problem now, no one will listen to me.

Author: termonator61
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: If you didn’t know, LWF will have its own service that will deal with solving the disputes. In order to resolve the conflict situation they will seize the reports about the parcel, which includes photo and video reports from all stages of delivery of the parcel. So you can be sure that in the event of a dispute, everything will be solved objectively.

Author: deort
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: And if I am not satisfied with the decision, what instance should I apply? Just try to understand me, I don’t want to order any expensive parcel and get to know that it was damaged and have no opportunity to apply any instance in order to be compensated.

Author: termonator61
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: If the dispute is resolved against you, perhaps, you really were the one to be blamed for the damaged parcel? I’ve already told you that we will use photo and video reports. Or do you want to suggest the platform to use some any more powerful evidence?

Author: deort
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: No, thanks. You know, I guess I went a bit too far. You’re right, if the photo and video reports show the innocence of the freight forwarder, it means that I am the only one who is guilty in the damage of the parcel.

The platform will be very important in development country.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: ro777jer
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

The shipping of the parcel by the freight forwarder will be strictly controlled, and all the data will be put into the smart contract. Even if the parcel is delivered in an inadequate condition, it will be possible to easily determine who is to blame for the damage to the parcel with the help of a smart contract. If you work with postal services, it is nearly impossible to find the one to blame in such a situation.

Author: MkrKing
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Greetings. You conducted an interesting observation, but apparently did it without any attempts to clarify the details. The main differences between LWF and postal services are the shorter time limits and the lower shipping costs. Goods In courier services pass through several checkpoints in which the parcel can be damaged or, worse, simply lost. In LWF one delivery will be carried out by one person who will carry out it directly. The entire delivery process is strictly controlled with the help of photo and video reports with the entry of information into a smart contract. Therefore, it makes no sense not to trust this method, because everything is as transparent as possible.

Author: Immer
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Hah, well, let's say it’s so, and why do you think that the shipping cost will be lower than that of the postal services? After all, as a rule, you have to pay extra for speed. In addition, forwarders will obviously include in their shipping costs their expenses such as staying at a hotel, having supper, etc.

Author: MkrKing
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Yes, you’re right, the forwarder has the right to take into account such costs, but this can’t be compared with how much postal services spend to pay for the services of intermediaries, which include warehouses, logistics companies, etc. But they also take into account all this in the cost of their services. I won’t say how much the cost of LWF services will be less than that of postal services, but I can say one thing for sure: the cost will be definitely lower.

Author: Immer
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: And don’t you know how things will be with the geography of activity? I just know that some postal services can’t deliver packages to all the countries. And if LWF doesn’t have any geographic restrictions, then it's really cool!

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

It is like a Uber for logistics, but we have a modern platform and a dPOS Blockchain.  *LWF P2P Portal in ALPHA on December 20th!!*  The Alpha version of the P2P Portal is currently in development.  The Portal will have the main functions available such as:  - User registrations and KYC verification - P2P Freight Forwarding, P2P Express Delivery and Packages collecting services available to be prepared. - Sales Offer by Forwarders can be created - Integration of Crypto's Payments - First minimal Blockchain Integration - Feedback - Beta-Forwarders will be imported from PRE-SALE subscriptions as exclusive testers

Author: Camerieresimone
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Dear LWF Community,  We are pleased to announce a new upgrade to our Testnet and our core-node (v. 0.1.2).  **The new features include:**  -Wallet addresses now have the identifier string LWF at the end of them, this customisation is a unique feature of our token.  -Essential Core Updates are now implemented. This feature means once a upgrade is announced and released you have until a certain block to update or your node will no longer be able to forge on the network until the update is implemented. This has been implemented as between now and Mainnet launch in February we will be releasing updates to the network core which will be required of the Logistics functions of the network meaning modes will need to be as up to date as possible.  -Minor bug fixes  -Wallet and Explorer updates to ensure compatibility with the new LWF addresses  We will soon be releasing more information regarding a New Desktop Wallet, the Alpha P2P Portal and   other things we cannot disclose at this time but we are sure you will love when they can finally be revealed.  Thank you all so much for supporting us by running a node and dont forget  the Early Supporters Program is runnning right now.  Kind Regards  __The LWF Team__

Author: californybit
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: So what’s the difference? The idea is the same: time limits are big; no one knows in what condition will the package be received by me. Moreover, if these are private-sector forwarders, I won’t know who will deliver my cargo.

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The difference is big. Large international transport companies deliver large consignments and leave them in logistic centers where they are being distributed for a long time. And the private-sector forwarders come right to your door, that’s why deliver costs and time limits decrease.

Author: californybit
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: You will also know well who will deliver your cargo. Each forwarder will sign in LWF and undergo KYC. If you’re embarrassed about the fact that he can fade away with your cargo, you should know that the forwarder leaves a deposit for such a case.

Author: Camerieresimone
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Official Announcement Dear LWF Community, want to share with you something!  Early Supporters Program is NOW LIVE  From November 14th 2017 to January 22nd 2018 22:00pm (GMT) we are inviting people to join our EARLY SUPPORTERS PROGRAM (ESP).  The requirements for joining the ESP is a minimum investment of 0.01BTC, this will activate a bonus of 25% for the investor, plus for each additional 0.5 BTC there will be an extra 0.5% bonus (up to a total maximum bonus of 45%). As well as our previously announced methods of investing in the project we are pleased to announce the addition of Oxy to your funding options.  Oxy is now accepted for contributions  LWF Testnet: Come and Forge with us! Our Testnet network is currently live and will be available until January 20th 2018.  An added incentive for those who participate in Testnet is the bonus of exclusive access to forging on Mainnet for 30 days before it is opened to the public.  LWF P2P Portal in ALPHA on December 20th!! The Alpha version of the P2P Portal is currently in development.  The Portal will have the main functions available such as:  - User registrations and KYC verification - P2P Freight Forwarding, P2P Express Delivery and Packages collecting services available to be prepared. - Sales Offer by Forwarders can be created - Integration of Crypto's Payments - First minimal Blockchain Integration - Feedback - Beta-Forwarders will be imported from PRE-SALE subscriptions as exclusive testers  LWF TEC Postponed until January 23rd 2018  We know that for various reasons the project has been delayed from the original dates, and for that we apologise, but it has been done with the project/supporters best interests in mind. We are currently developing the P2P Portal and the Blockchain as scheduled but we will need a little more time to start the TEC Period. This situation has occurred as we are planning to improve our visibility, marketing strategies and development of the prototype P2P Portal which we will provide to communities so they can experience what the project is aiming for and where the money raised is going to be used. We wish to provide the product before the main TEC period, firstly so we can show PRE-SALE Investors where their money has been used and to prove we are truly trying to make something that can work in real world. Early Supporters Refund Form  Kind Regards The LWF Team

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: In the LWF DPos system,  each delegate would receive 5 LWF coins for every new block they forge on the network. If within the block,  the delegate processes a number of  transactions, they would also receive transaction fees in addition. These cover for the operating costs of maintaining their MainNet servers.

Author: Scholles
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Yes,  to redeem your coins actually, you follow this steps: You must create a LWF Wallet through our link: https://wallet.lwf.io/ When you arrive at the first screen, you have the option to Click on 'New Account' this will then generate a 12 words secret passphrase.This step is very important, please save your 12 word phrase somewhere very safe. Without your passphrase, you will not be able to gain access to your coins! It's critical you save this somewhere secure, as there is no password reset! When you're inside the wallet, you will see on the left hand side your public wallet adddress. Remember that bonus and your donation properties will be counted during distributions.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: The TEC which begins on the 27th November would start with a bonus of 25% until 29th. From then 20% till 5th December, and 18% till 10th December. 16% from 11th to 19th December. 14% until 22nd December and 10% from 23rd December till TEC ends. Tokens would be distributed 2 days after ico ends.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Also having partnered with very good start-ups, surrounded by a very dedicated team of professionals, I would still choose to invest in LWF.

Author: Camerieresimone
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: *Dear LWF Community,*  To offer the best service to you and after great feedback received from our community and advisors, following the efficient startup process we have updated some rules for the main Token Exchange Campaign (TEC).  As you can read in our updated whitepaper the token distribution process has been changed: all the tokens (78MLN) included pre-sale weight will be divided considering the total amount of funds received, instead of giving a fixed price for each token. This will avoid token surplus on the main LWF wallet and will give the maximum advantage to our early supporters in this TEC round.  We also have a new early investor bonus, which is on offer for a number of days before TEC launch *(November 14th 10:00 GMT to November 22th 10:00GMT)*.  Supporters of the TEC phase, will also have the opportunity of receiving varying bonuses, which reduce throughout TEC.  Please take a look to our whitepaper and the main landing page of our website!  *Main website Page: https://www.lwf.io/en * *LWF Whitepaper: https://www.lwf.io/docs/lwf_whitepaper_en.pdf *  *-- Profile and Contributions page will be updated Monday with the test-net opening! --*  Stay in touch!  *The LWF Team*

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: No working prototype is available at the moment, however, funds raised through its pre-sale would be used in developing it's p2p platform with core service of freight Forwarders and the Blockchain logistics function. The DPos technology which would be implemented on this platform, will enable LWF devs create a secure, decentralized and performance-based logistics database through the blockchain and network-generated transactions. With this that will enable LWF to develop technology to make it a future standard for global logistics. Any logistics or handling company will be able to lean on LWF DPos blockchain, keeping in this way its data in a distributed database that will safeguard the company's data, making any logistic operation unassailable to any threats related to classical information systems. Regarding the percentages allocated for legal and insurance funds, already this project has advisors garnished with years of experience in logistics industry and crypto-ecosystem and also just recently, it partnered with credible start-ups and the entire structure was revisited. However, the project plans to run a second ico in future if there are leftovers tokens from main token sale which can cater for financial eventualities incase the 5% allocated to each are not enough, IMHO.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Delivery is a critical part of the value chain for an optimal e-commerce service. Registered LWF vendors will offer freight-forwarding services to users of The Block. Also sellers on The Block may use registered LWF vendors to deliver their goods to buyers. LWF vendors will use the LWF internal network and follow the LWF business strategy to ensure the security and privacy of The Block’s sellers and buyers, as well as the satisfactory delivery of goods.

Author: Eldest
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: OFFICIAL ANNOUNCEMENT REGARDING THE PROJECT  To the LWF community,  The developers of LWF - Local World Forwarders have decided to change the the Technology that will be used to power the project.  We will be changing from using the ERC20 Token to our very own DPOS Blockchain.  This will necessitate postponing the TEC Sale until the 27th November and it will now finish on 28th December.  There will be a 10% ADDITIONAL Bonus for those who have already participated in the Pre-Sale (from its start on this announcement) as a fidelity reward.  This will be automatically reflected in your LWF balance on Tuesday 7th November.  Redemption of your LWF tokens will be via the TEC Profile at the end of the TEC Sale as was previously scheduled.  We would also like to announce a official working partnership between LWF and Oxycoin.  We are happy to welcome @lepetitejan (Jan, Oxycoin CEO) and @seatrips (Rob, Oxycoin Co-Founder) as official supporter for the blockchain developement and to  Andrea, Gian Maria and Stefano as new developement team members.  There has been a agreement reached with Bitboost - The Block which will see the LWF project manage their logistical needs.  LWF testnet will go live for interested participants from 13th November, we would like you to come help us make sure our network will be a robust as possible and as thank you there will be 10 days of Pre-Forging on the mainnet for those who have taken part in the Testnet phase.  *Links*  https://wallet.lwf.io LWF Wallet (currently only testnet version is available)  https://www.lwf.io Our website. For up to date information regarding the project.  Also please visit our new BLOCKCHAIN section  Any queries please feel free to here, in out telegram channel or you can email info@lwf.io.  Please note this is for information purposes and spamming is not allowed  Thank you so much for taking the time to read this announcement. The team looks forward to working with our great community.  Kind Regards  The LWF Team  Official Announcement EN: https://www.lwf.io/docs/announcement_en.pdf  Official Announcement ITA: https://www.lwf.io/docs/announcement_it.pdf  Official Announcement RU: https://www.lwf.io/docs/announcement_ru.pdf

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: Scholles
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: LWF integrated its DPoS blockchain to allow everyone that  votes and supports Forgers and Delegate in the community to obtain free LWF Coin. Also the Dpos will enable us to create a secure, decentralized and performance-based logistics database through the blockchain and network-generated transactions: that will enable us to develop technology to make it a future standard for global logistics.

Author: khroma
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Any user in the world can sign up to be a forwarder via LWF portal an earn extra income every month just by collecting and forwarding parcels.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Anyone  can actually be a forwarder in the LWF platform. It is especially beneficial to anyone who invests during the ICO period, if he decides to become a forwarder during the ICO, he will immediately become eligible for an advantageous seller level and a 25% discount on intermediation fees charged by the platform, for 6 months. This is to encourage the creation of a freight forwarder network before the platform is launched.

Author: Scholles
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: What's the prerequisites to become a forwarder on the platform or can company paper suffice?

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Find the requirements below: Full KYC verification, - Accept the terms agreement, - Provide a dynamic caution fee based on the volume of packages that you want to manage. (For an example, if you want to receive packages from buyers of 200$ of max amount, you've to place 150$ in caution to prevent any kind of scam. This caution fee will be released as soon you leave the vendor status. Usually in 2 weeks of job, upgrading with feedbacks and packages forwarded amount, you can easily cover the caution fees or increase it to have more packages per week to be managed.) Registration for Beta-Forwarders is now opened as presale currently ongoing, will be a check to flag if you want to apply to the beta-services.

You can become a forwarder. Anyone who decides to become a forwarder during the ICO will immediately become eligible for an advantageous seller level and a 25% discount on intermediation fees charged by the platform, for 6 months. This is to encourage the creation of a freight forwarder network before the platform is launched.                You want to send american politicians in Russia ??

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Forwarder places a dynamic deposit as caution for anti-fraud fund. This deposit will be returned whenever he decides to quit being a forwarder. For forwarder level 1 caution is dynamic and can be of max 700$ (1050$ max value received by single shipping) other forwarders level have a standard caution (more information about level will be published in a week with official Beta-Forwarders program). A fraud-compliant team would would carry out investigation after which a full refund of the parcel will be refunded to buyer and caution of seller will be kept as compensation and his account banned.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: According to the wp, the total insurance would allow via payment of a fiat percentage based on the declared value of the goods (with a documented proof), shipment protection & customer care carry out all checks for confirmation, and provide a full refund of goods were lost,  damaged beyond repair on shipment transit. In this case, 90 percent of refund on the declared value is paid.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: These figures are unknown now, vendors can choose a flat price for the packages, based on recipient's weight of the package, country of origin and other options selected by buyer. In the LWF website one can pay in FIAT (USD/EUR), Tokens (LWF) and ETH\BTC. Each one have different conversion fees and platform commissions. Tokens have less fees, more advantages (like dividends each month, etc.), BTC and ETH are in the middle, commission a bit higher than tokens but no dividends and about FIAT have highest commissions with no benefits unlike the former.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: I read that private freight forwarders will receive buyers packages at their home or any other suitable locations and forward them. It will set the coverage limit of its services and a selection of possible shipping methods and relatively delivery costs and times. In addition to its own commission by entering this information into the LWF system.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Yes to register as a forwarder, you would need: -  Full KYC verification, - Accept the terms agreement, - Provide a dynamic caution fee based on the volume of packages that you want to manage. (For an example, if you want to receive packages from buyers of 200$ of max amount, you've to place 150$ in caution to prevent any kind of scam. This caution fee will be released as soon you leave the vendor status. Usually in 2 weeks of job, upgrading with feedbacks and packages forwarded amount, you can easily cover the caution fees or increase it to have more packages per week to be managed.) Registration for Beta-Forwarders is now opened as presale currently ongoing, will be a check to flag if you want to apply to the beta-services.

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Customers can collect their packages at a private collection point nearby, arranging pickup directly with the designated forwarders. The vendor can also agree to directly deliver to the customer.

Author: Vorteqs
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Are there any form of benefits that registering as a forwarder now offer to the users or maybe any motivation to encourage people to register being put in place?

Author: enigmatical
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Yes,  there are benefits. Anyone who decides to become a forwarder during the ICO will immediately become eligible for an advantageous seller level and a 25% discount on intermediation fees charged by the platform, for 6 months. This is to encourage the creation of a freight forwarder network before the platform is launched.
