Author: Camerieresimone
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Oh! Sure i got it. You can place a dynamic deposit as caution for anti-fraud fund. Your deposit will be returned as soon you're not a forwarder anymore (so whenever you want). You can receive packages of a value based on 150% of your dynamic deposit caution. So if you place 100$, you'll receive forwarding orders only from buyer that declare their stuff have a value of 150$ or less. For forwarder level 1 caution is dynamic and can be of max 700$ (1050$ max value received by single shipping) other forwarders level have a standard caution (more information about level will be published in a week with official Beta-Forwarders program)

Author: Camerieresimone
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Well, first at all: we'll provide the infrastructure .. (so, a easy and friendly interface where forwarders can place the offers, and buyer can select through our alghoritm the best one that match with user needs) then we provide intermediation between exchanges to change LWF Tokens to FIAT (EUR/USD) and ETH/BTC (EUR/USD). Also our Forwarders can redeem the EUR\USD credit through a SEPA sent by us to his bank account (user must be verified with our KYC and this service can be offered by a third part company as well still development stage)  Last we provide burocratic papers to easy fill and sign the stuff required to ship packages to a specific country. Our support will be also available for help in shipping and packaging problems or questions.

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Good conditions. How can I apply for beta testing?

Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎

Author: Camerieresimone
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Form to become a LWF forwarder need just a few thing: -  Full KYC verification, - Accept the terms agreement, - Provide a dynamic caution fee based on the volume of packages that you want to manage. (For an example, if you want to receive packages from buyers of 200$ of max amount, you've to place 150$ in caution to prevent any kind of scam. This caution fee will be released as soon you leave the vendor status. Usually in 2 weeks of job, upgrading with feedbacks and packages forwarded amount, you can easily cover the caution fees or increase it to have more packages per week to be managed.).   Registration for Beta-Forwarders will be opened as soon the presale start, will be a check to flag if you want to apply to the beta-services.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: LWF Changes the Concept of Logistics with P2P As Uber did for Shipping  ICO LIVE- LWF.Local World Forwarder, the world's first decentralized logistics platform. Change the concept of logistics with P2P and decentralization As Uber did for shipping  When someone thinks about logistics, the first thing that comes to mind is: DHL, UPS and, why not, Amazon or other major service providers involved in the global delivery system. More than 88% of the world's packages are managed by a third party company. They take the package forwarding it through one of these large companies. All this to get a profit from the final customer.  When Uber started they asked themselves: "why should transport be so expensive for people?" and: "how can we make a profit for us and for the citizen?" so Uber was born.  Well, for LWF it’s the same. We have noticed that in many countries in the world retail products are very difficult to find on time and at a good price against Europe / US's main market; this due to a lot of reasons: protectionism, fear to ship in some countries, control of the price around the world by the big companies and of course the poor logistics services in the growing-up countries.  LWF will let users have a decentralized, clear and profitable environment where to safely build the first P2P-logistic-network.  https://coinidol.com/lwf-changes-the-concept-of-logistics/

With a decentralized logistics platform as this project LWF, it will tackle this lapses that costs billions of dollars.

Author: Aleksandra 81
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: Well, in order to send a parcel, it must be carried somewhere? Who will receive the parcels from the population? In electronic form it will be possible only to arrange the delivery route and pay for the services, but you will not take the parcel.

Author: Camerieresimone
Title: 🌎【ANN】【ICO】🌎 LWF - First decentralized logistics platform - 🌎
Body: You can carry the delivery by yourself if it is possible (like the case if you've to do an express delivery with our mobile app) but usually you've to find your best "global partner" (dhl, ups, fedex, royal mail for example) without using third part shippers. Usually people go to a third part forwarder because paper work to do for send a parcel to an international receiver is very hard and one person can get scared from customs etc. Our site will provide documentation and also when you're going to send a parcel gonna be "Person to Person" and not "Business to Person" so your package have a very low amount of % that gonna be checked by customs for more tax (In fact, parcel are be checked for drugs, weapons etc. But for tax only B2P parcels are more or less checked in proportion 1 to 15 (it can be different for each country) while P2P is like 1 to 100). So avoiding third part fees, and working a bit on our platform you can become a forwarder and increare your monthly incomes just helping people to receive your package!
